job_tasks.phrase: Work together with us to bring our consumer data platform to the next level.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on improving an existing platform to meet business objectives and drive the company forward.

job_tasks.phrase: Our platform is mission critical in supplying valuable data to other teams in the Consumer department.
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the importance of the platform to business operations and its role in supporting other departments.

job_tasks.phrase: Our goal: to remain the preferred delivery company in the Benelux, and we believe that technical innovation and logistical intelligence will help us do that.
job_tasks.justification: Connects technical work directly to overarching business strategy and market position.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be translating complex business processes, into practical software applications.
job_tasks.justification: Directly states the task of understanding business needs and converting them into technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: You are most welcome to think with your team about the use of new technologies, product improvements and the software architecture.
job_tasks.justification: Encourages strategic thinking about technology's role in product development and architecture, which is tied to business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Our applications are built with Python and with Serverless AWS infrastructure CI/CD in a microservices architecture.
job_tasks.justification: Describes the technical stack and architectural style for application development.

job_tasks.phrase: You are most welcome to think with your team about the use of new technologies, product improvements and the software architecture.
job_tasks.justification: Implies involvement in the design and implementation of software architecture and product enhancements.

job_tasks.phrase: All modern technologies and our whole engineering community are here to support you.
job_tasks.justification: Indicates an environment where software development is supported by a community and modern technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: As a senior full-stack developer, you will help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI.
job_tasks.justification: Positions the role as actively contributing to advancements in data science and GenAI, which involves software development.

job_tasks.phrase: You take the lead in developing innovative solutions, collaborating with experts and promoting technology in the data science community and engineering community.
job_tasks.justification: Highlights leadership in creating solutions and fostering technology adoption, core to software development roles.

job_tasks.phrase: Senior Integratie Engineer
job_tasks.justification: This title directly implies a role focused on developing integration solutions, a form of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Door de juiste integratie oplossingen te ontwikkelen zorg jij ervoor dat het applicatie- en IT landschap van PostNL keten breed op elkaar aansluit.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states the development of integration solutions to connect different parts of the IT landscape.

job_tasks.phrase: Our applications are built with Python and with Serverless AWS infrastructure CI/CD in a microservices architecture.
job_tasks.justification: Reiterates the context of building applications within a specific technical architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: You are most welcome to think with your team about the use of new technologies, product improvements and the software architecture.
job_tasks.justification: Indicates participation in decisions and implementation regarding software architecture and product enhancements.

job_tasks.phrase: You will work together with allying platforms, peers, and colleagues in the consumer domain.
job_tasks.justification: Implies collaborative software development work with other teams and platforms.

job_tasks.phrase: Moreover, you will be part of the PostNL engineering community in which we share "best practices" and innovations in our company.
job_tasks.justification: Positions the role within an engineering community focused on sharing knowledge and driving innovation, common in software development.

job_tasks.phrase: as a senior full-stack developer, you will help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions contributing to generative AI, which often involves model development, fine-tuning, or advanced usage.

job_tasks.justification: While broad, 'developing innovative solutions' in the context of 'data science and generative AI' implies work with models.

job_tasks.phrase: We built a central consumer data platform that contains all interactions and engagements of our consumers with PostNL.
job_tasks.justification: Describes the existence and nature of a data platform, implying data collection and management.

job_tasks.phrase: Our platform is mission critical in supplying valuable data to other teams in the Consumer department.
job_tasks.justification: Reinforces the role of the platform in providing data, which is a core aspect of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be translating complex business processes, into practical software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: You are most welcome to think with your team about the use of new technologies, product improvements and the software architecture.
job_tasks.justification: This encourages proactive problem-solving and strategic thinking about technical solutions and improvements.

job_tasks.phrase: Development Opportunities: You will have ample opportunities to attend training programmes and grow into other positions or departments.

classification.rationale: The role explicitly mentions making strides in 'generative AI' and involves developing software solutions around data science. While strong on software development and data aspects, the direct reference to GenAI and implied application development makes it lean towards GenAI Engineer.
